DataElement.preferredName: Diagnosis Present at Admission PCORnet CDM Indicator Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:An indication that a diagnosed condition was evident at admission.:An indication that a diagnosed condition was evident at admission._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:An indication that a diagnosed condition was evident at admission.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Property.preferredDefinition: An indication that a diagnosed condition was evident at admission.

Concepts.definition: An indication that a diagnosed condition was evident at admission.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredName: PCORnet Common Data Model Diagnosis Present at Admission Indicator Code
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A data model designed to standardize PCORnet data._An indication that a diagnosed condition was evident at admission._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied._A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not provided or available.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: Not employed or utilized.

Concepts.definition: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that a diagnosed condition was not evident at admission.

Concepts.definition: An indication that a diagnosed condition was not evident at admission.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

Concepts.definition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement.: A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.

Concepts.definition: Not meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement.
A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.: A term referring to the lack of definitive clinical or pathologic criteria for a tumor to predict its clinical course or to classify it as benign or malignant.

Concepts.definition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.
A term referring to the lack of definitive clinical or pathologic criteria for a tumor to predict its clinical course or to classify it as benign or malignant.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that a diagnosed condition was evident at admission.

Concepts.definition: An indication that a diagnosed condition was evident at admission.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.
